::SnowCat::
She saw Striker attacking Ramulus. Thinking he had been chipped, she 
ran towards him, still cloaked.  Then she uncloaked and leaped at 
Striker's back, trying to knock him over.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/Smokescreen/Slayer::
> 
> "Take her out of here!" Ramulus yells to Smokescreen as Spears goes 
> into stasis lock, "We'll meet you back at the Ark!"
> 
> The Maximal deactivates his cloaking device, tossing it to the
> cloaked Smokescreen, who activates it on Spears. Smokescreen picks
> her up, and runs off at full speed, both him and Spears cloaked.
> 
> Ramulus looks over to Prebon and Koj. They had Spears, or almost at 
> least, now they just had to get Striker. Ramulus nearly yelps in 
> surprize as a shot hits him in the back, the Maximal stumbling 
> forward, his chest wound almost repaired by his T2 body.
>  
> "Big mistake to uncloak, Maximal," a familiar voice sounds behind 
> Ramulus. He spins around, his eyes widening when he sees Slayer 
> standing there, also uncloaked.
> 
> "Striker! There you are, let's get out of here!"
> 
> Slayer frowns. "I'm afraid you have the wrong bot, Maximal. I am 
here 
> to kill you."
> 
> Ramulus sighs, dodging a shot from Slayer. He was starting to get 
> annoyed at these chips. The Maximal takes careful aim, firing the 
> anti-chip weapon and hitting Slayer in the head.
> 
> "There," he says as Slayer stumbles backwards, Ramulus walking up 
to 
> him, "Now lets get out of h-"
> 
> Ramulus is sent flying backwards by a punch from Slayer, swearing 
as 
> he flips, but managing to land on his feet. He frowns, his scanners 
> not detecting any foreign chip inside Slayer. Maybe Lunarpine had 
> predicted the truth....
> 
> Ramulus takes a step back, preparing for battle as his opponent
> calmly 
> walks toward him.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Spears::
> > 
> > She watched as her quills hit Ramulus, leaving deep gashes in his 
> > chest plates. She slashed at him again, but he dissappeared 
infront 
> > of her eyes.  She felt something his her shoulder. She felt the 
> shock 
> > of two programs trying to fight each other.  She dropped her 
spears 
> > and clutched at her shoulder, putting her hand over the chip. She 
> > fell to her knees and screamed out. Her eyes flashed and she fell
> to 
> > the ground, going into stasis lock.  The two programs were 
> cancelling 
> > each other out and shorting out her circuits.  A small ribbon of 
> > smoke escaped out of her shoulder a
